short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily connect to your HR cloud with Hirelink!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app makes it easy to add new hires into your payroll or HRIS system by injecting the job seekers information directly from ApplicantPro without you needing to manually type it in
